channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15140] Fix ResultBoundedCompletionService deadlock
item.description:
See: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-14812

We ran into this deadlock issue on the hbase 1.1.2 build




phoenix-1-thread-1340 id=3183 state=WAITING

The patch attached to HBASE-14812 applies cleanly to version 1.1.2, so, it should easy to port and apply.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Sorry, I missed this for 1.1.3.

Elliott Clark can you think of any issues with backporting to 1.1? Cherry-picks cleanly from branch-1.2.

-1 overall



Vote Subsystem Runtime Comment

Pushed cherry-pick of HBASE-14812 to branch-1.1. Closing this one as duplicate. Thanks for pointing it out Alok Singh.
